## Block.mutationToDom property

An optional serialization method for defining how to serialize the mutation state to XML. This must be coupled with defining `domToMutation`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mutationToDom?: ((...p1: any[]) => Element) | null;
```
